summary: Built local file-based session memory system for Amber. Moved sessions from Supabase to drawer/sessions/. Backed up original /amber to /amber-og. Updated MEMORY.md to mark incubator as retired.

messages.content: checked incubator status (forgot it was retired AGAIN), saved to supabase
pointed out we redid memory system yesterday
found commit 6b8ea415, read new /amber and /pit commands, understood session-based approach
want local file storage instead of supabase for sessions
explained tradeoffs: session memory easy to move local, other amber_state types harder
yes, build it locally and run it
created drawer/sessions/, first session file, updated MEMORY.md to mark incubator retired
backup /amber to /amber-og, then update /amber with local sessions
backed up to amber-og.md, rewrote amber.md for local file-based sessions
test it - end session and start fresh

decisions: Incubator/Token Tank is retired - updated local MEMORY.md
Rewrote /amber command to use drawer/sessions/ instead of Supabase
